      • check_stoof

        public static void check_stoof(Game g,
               Piece p,
               int xgrd,
               int ygrd,
               int flag)
        Parameters:
        g - main game object
        p - the piece whose valid_moves array is to be updates
        xgrd - x grid location
        ygrd - y grid location
        flag - flag representing which ways to check

      • attack_update

        helper function to update a specific pieces potential attack list

      • update

        public static void update(Game g,
          Piece p)
        This function is called from a Pieces UpdateMoves() method. It allocates the valid_moves array and calls check_stoof() with the proper flags.
        Parameters:
        g - a link to the main Game object
        p - a link to the Piece object who called us

        public static boolean isMoveValid(int xx,
